title: Projet pour Pl. 12 de L'Albume de 1832
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Denis Auguste Marie Raffet [1804-1860]; his son, Auguste Raffet fils [1839-1910], until November 9, 1910; his estate; his estate sale, Vente Raffet, Hotel Drouot, Paris France, March 16, 1911 [1]. Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ, by June 12, 1974 [2]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1975.

Notes:
[1]. Vente Raffet circular stamp, L.2126, on recto lower right. The sale was entitled "Peintures, Aquarelles, Dessins & Lithographies de A. Raffet....Formant la Succession de Feu M. Aug. Raffet fils."
[2]. Daniel and Jane Fishkoff loaned the work to the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute in June 1974; see curatorial file for original loan form and list of works.

creator.birth_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, ÃŽle-de-France, France)
